node.statement: DISCRETE HILBERT TRANSFORM IS EMPTY FOR n=1: By definition, H_p(lambda_i) = sum_{j=1, j!=i}^{n} 1/(lambda_i - lambda_j). When n=1, there is exactly one root lambda_1 = a, and the sum runs over j in {1,...,1} with j != 1, which is the empty set. Therefore H_p(a) = 0 (empty sum). The same holds for H_q(b) = 0 and H_r(a+b) = 0.
